author: nedpyle
body:
There are no equivalents in Rename-Computer (or Add/Remove-Computer) for:

Netdom computername /add
Netdom computername /makeprimary

(i.e. NetAddAlternateComputerName(), NetSetPrimaryComputerName () public APIs)

Netdom computername /Remove  
Netdom computername /Enumerate  
Netdom computername /Verify
title: Missing parity with legacy Netdom.exe Computername
